data.title: Medieval and Renaissance Film Library
data.meta_description: The Center’s Film Library is open for use by students and faculty, including many titles acquired for our CMRS Film Series.  Current Holdings (May 2022) 1612 Vladimir Khotinenko, 2007, DVD Pyotr Kislov, Michal Zebrowski, Atur Smolyaninov
data.text:
The Center’s Film Library is open for use by students and faculty, including many titles acquired for our CMRS Film Series.
